summary: A brief email from November 7, 2019, regarding a follow-up conversation about Epstein, indicating coordination among recipients to schedule a meeting. The document shows ongoing discussions about Epstein shortly after his death in August 2019.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email's subject and content indicate he is the topic of a follow-up conversation among the recipients.

events.title: Email coordination for Epstein follow-up
events.description: An email is sent to coordinate a 5-10 minute meeting to follow up on a conversation about Epstein from the previous night.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 7, 2019, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The subject and content indicate ongoing discussions or investigations related to Epstein.
The sender is attempting to coordinate a brief follow-up meeting among multiple recipients regarding Epstein.
